How to play Auburn Match

Auburn Match is an Auburn twist on the classic game Memory. The basic game is played with cards all face down on the board. There are two of each card on the board, and the goal is to match each card with its partner. Choose two cards at a time, if they match they will be removed from play. If not, they will be turned back over.

Classic Mode: Match all of the cards in the fewest moves possible.

 Timed Mode: Match all of the cards in the quickest time.

Versus Mode: This is a local two player game mode. Take turns with a friend playing the game, and whoever has the most matches when all the cards are matched wins!

So get going and match all things Auburn from Aubie to Bo to Jordan-Hare and more!
